What are the treatments for Renpenning syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Renpenning syndrome:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Renpenning syndrome 1  - Greenwood Genetics Center: X-Linked Intellectual Disability  - Kennedy Krieger Institute: Center for Genetic Disorders of Cognition and Behavior   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information ab
